targets.query: SELECT mean("uptime") FROM "gigamon_stats" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$host$/ AND "model"::tag != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "model"::tag fill(none)
SELECT mean("uptime") FROM "gigamon_stats" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$host$/ AND "serialnum"::tag != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serialnum"::tag fill(none)
SELECT mean("memTotal") - mean("memFree") FROM "gigamon_stats" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"::tag fill(none)

SELECT mean("hrStorageUsed") / mean("hrStorageSize") *100  FROM "gigamon_storage_table" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hrStorageDescr"::tag fill(none)

list.definition: show tag values with key = hostname
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values with key = hostname

list.definition: show tag values with key = ifName
list.name: interface
list.query: show tag values with key = ifName
